// Chef n triangles.cpp

#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	long long int ans = 0;
	long long int n,k;

	while (t-->0)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k);
		ans = 0;
		ans = ((k*(n - k)*(n - k - 1)) / 2) + ((k*(k - 1)*(n - k)) / 2) + (((n - k)*(n - k - 1)*(n - k - 2)) / 6);
		printf("%lld\n",ans);

	}
	
	return 0;
}
